name: AirWick
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Welcome to the Air Wick Alexa Skill. 
 
Connect your account with Amazon Alexa to receive notifications when your Air Wick Essentials Bluetooth Diffuser is running low on fragrance. You can also choose to set up smart reorders from Amazon. With Smart Reorders, an automatic order will be placed when you need it so you never run out.
 
To set up smart reordering, and receive automatic fragrance reorders so that you never run out, simply press "Settings" in your navigation bar of the "Air Wick" application, press "Amazon Dash Replenishment" then proceed using the on screen prompts. You can also navigate to the Alexa app, click "Devices" in the bottom right-hand corner, and choose your Air Wick diffuser. From the device's Settings page, under the "Status" section, select "Change" next to "Supply." From here, select "Automatically reorder when supply is low.
